Address.label: Address
Address.value: 8400 E. CRESCENT PARKWAY,SUITE 600, GREENWOOD VILLAGE, Colorado, 80111, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Gatos Silver, Inc. is a U.S.-based silver company focused on high-grade, large silver deposits in geopolitically stable jurisdictions. The company's flagship asset is the Los Gatos District, including the Cerro Los Gatos Mine in Chihuahua, Mexico.
